TopicTitle: Trying out the Tarsier Space Technology Mod (space telescopes)

Articles.Content:
Gave this mod a try today and had a lot of fun, very different to other mods I've seen. I managed to get the hang of keeping it quite steady and zooming at distant objects but if anyone could let me know why I could only ever see the night-side of some planets even when their dayside should be facing me I would love to know!

If you want to see my post, it's at http://www.kerbalspaceblog.com/?p=491

The James Jebb Telescope above Kerbin
